import sys

n, t = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
bus = []
for i in range(n):
    s, d = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    bus.append([s, d])

bus.sort()

for i in range(n):
    if bus[i][0] <= t:
        print(i + 1)
        break

import sys

n, t = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
buses = []
for i in range(n):
    s, d = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    buses.append((s, d))
buses.sort(key=lambda x: x[0])
for i in range(len(buses)):
    if buses[i][0] <= t:
        print(i + 1)
        break
